name: OnePageCRM
description: Super easy on-line sales CRM for small business. Pipeline & Contact Management with bullet-proof follow-up system and almost zero-admin sales.

apis.name: OnePageCRM
apis.description: If you are looking at this page youu2019re hopefully thinking about developing a cool plugin or service for OnePageCRM using our API access. Check out our documentation and spread the OnePage love and eco-system. OnePage uses a RESTful API with XML, JSON or YAML over HTTP. Weu2019re continuously improving and updating our app and the API. Check out Version History for recently applied updates.
